item.title: Egon Willigh‚òÆgen
item.description: omg, #elsevier, what are you doing??? it's a PDF / HTML!And still they are surprised people turn to third-party solutions like Sci-Hub.#enshitification

item.title: Giuseppe Michieli
item.description: @BorisBarbour An emergency immunization drive to cover Gaza population is planned by the WHO, provided a truce in the area to permit medical missions to operate safely. The AFP detected are related to a vaccine-derived-poliovirus (cVDPV). Israel government is directly responsible for every public health emergency should emerge from their war activity against civilians in the zone.

item.title: Pauline von Hellermann
item.description: British diplomat Mark Smith resigns over UK arms sales to Israel - what a principled, brave decision. ‚ÄúIt is with sadness that I resign after a long career in the diplomatic service, however, I can no longer carry out my duties in the knowledge that this Department may be complicit in war crimes‚Äù#Gaza #StopArmingIsrael #UKhttps://aoav.org.uk/2024/senior-british-diplomat-mark-smith-resigns-over-uks-arms-sales-to-israel/

item.description:
The wicked ensured
through destruction of clean water sources, and by destroying conditions for health, for life
That after 25 years the disease which paralyses children permanently
would return.
And screamed in every broadcast

item.title: Matthew Merkovich :clippy:
item.description: Who was I recently speaking with about the sliminess of academic journals, JSTOR, and Elsevier? Well, today, @pluralistic dropped a real barn burner into my email inbox with this great piece. Enjoy, all of you who like the free flow of academic knowledge!https://pluralistic.net/2024/08/16/the-public-sphere/

item.title: Laffy
item.description: Via Emptywheel: 1/2Now that two weeks of demands that Kamala do a press conference has ended with recognition that #Trump has created Potemkin Pressers, we need to have a convo about how Trump has cowed the press.There's so much they simply refuse to cover.Josh Marshall: Reader asks a good question: how many editorials/questions did you see asking for detail on the central policy theme of the GOP convention which was "mass deportation"?

item.title: Boris Barbour
item.description: Hopefully more decisions to come that will return some basic humanity to the UK immigration system, especially regarding family reunions.https://www.ein.org.uk/news/afghan-families-separated-during-2021-kabul-military-evacuation-can-now-apply-be-reunited-uk

item.title: Molly White
item.description: Newsletter: As parts of the crypto industry scramble to court the Harris administration with events like ‚ÄúCrypto4Harris‚Äù, others insist it is Harris who must ‚Äúbend the knee‚Äù.https://www.citationneeded.news/issue-64/#crypto #cryptocurrency #newsletter #CitationNeeded

item.title: John Scott-Railton ‚òï
item.description: NEW: researchers say #TikTok screen time predicts level of pro-#China views on key topics.Why? They say #TikTok boosts pro-#China content & actively suppress criticisms of China.E.g. they find sensitive topics like #Taiwan, persecution of #Uyghurs & #Tibet are buried by pro-#CCP influencer content & irrelevant vids.By NCRI at Rutgers pairing psychological survey research & social media analysis.https://networkcontagion.us/wp-content/uploads/NCRI-Report_-The-CCPs-Digital-Charm-Offensive.pdf#infosec #tiktok #propaganda #infosec #cybersecurity

item.title: Cheshire

https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/article/2024/aug/18/inciting-rioters-in-britain-was-a-test-run-for-elon-musk-just-see-what-he-plans-for-america?CMP=Share_AndroidApp_Other

item.title: Boris Barbour
item.description: Ukraine to invade Belarus?? If those troop numbers are correct (which is hard to believe), it doesn't sound like they would need so many troops to defend Ukraine. It might be quite easy to trigger an uprising to depose Lukashenko, gain new allies and free up more troops eventually. Russia would have no means to respond.https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/belarus-lukashenko-says-nearly-third-army-sent-ukraine-border-belta-reports-2024-08-18/

item.title: Peter Gleick
item.description: Apparently "thoughts and prayers" don't work for Trump so he's getting bulletproof glass.

item.title: Euromaidan Press
item.description: The last third major bridge over the Seym River reportedly destroyed in Kursk Oblast's Glushkovsky district (upd: photo shows other bridge)This is according to a Ukrainian Telegram channel and Russian milblogger Romanov. The move was easily predictable after the destruction of two other bridges, and for Russians, it complicates the defense of a 600+ sq km area separated from the "mainland" by the Seym.Now Russian logistics will have to rely on pontoon bridges and boats to supply the
